QueryText: Management of Bunchy top disease of banana
KccAns: Once the plant affected with this disease it is imposibble to cure so Use virus-free suckers apply carbofuran granules 20gP thrice on base of the plant 20DAP65DAP and 160 DAP

QueryText: control measures of Banana rhizome weevil and bunchy top disease
KccAns: Field sanitationremove all bunchy top affected plants Apply neem cake 1kgplant 25 g phorate 10G eg Thimet 10G or 20 g carbofuran 3G eg Furadan 3G each 20 days 75 days and 165 days after planting

QueryText: Control measures of bunchy top disease
KccAns: There is no cure for bunchy top viral disease However it can be avoided byusing disease-free planting materialscontrolling of aphids using soapy water or insecticidal soap Spray the plants thoroughly importantly on petioles furled leaves whorls or on young suckersremoving and rouging of infected banana plants Chop dry and bury the infected plants

The initial symptom is the presence of dark-green spots on the petioles midribs and leaf veins of the newly emerging leaves The infected leaves are erect narrow stunted and often have yellow leaf margins The leaves become smaller as the disease progresses Eventually the crown of the plant is composed of only stunted leaves producing a bunchy top hence this got that  name
Vector control using tobacco decoction Clean cultivation
